Something about Myself

Hello! I am Massimo, I am very interested in how computers work, and how programs and internet are so useful. A couple of years ago I was wondering how to organize my days and remember my expenses, together with the tips, then I made a little program for the command line, learning java. With that on my desktop I just wanted to learn more and I looked into web-development. The biggest part of my last spare time is been used to try building application or websites, i like to learn new technologies and to build something with them.

MY CURRENT SKILLS:
  • The functionality of the pages in my portfolio is powered by Javascript without any framework, out of the apps made with React. Calls used in some projects, to get data from other API's, and display them on the screen, are from the fetch-API or AJAX calls.
  • HTML 5 : is written considering what I know about SEO, custom attributes, semantic markup to understand the code, and using the new features of the web. A new tool that I am using to increase this aspects is the audits dev tool of the chrome browser.
  • For the server-side I know something about PHP , and server side Javascript with Node, that are the backend for some apps, but the most I've been doing until now is about building front-end interfaces.
  • Coding the design with CSS I use also SASS as pre-processor, and i try to meet the design type that is considered up-to-date, in some applications I used Bootstrap.
  • Mobile Friendly: all the finished projects in my portfolio are fully responsive for different devices and screens.


Portfolio

Projects in overview

3 best projects

React Application

Social Network

Social App with strong backend, using React, Redux, React-Router, and the backend with NODE connected to MongoDB. the layout is done with Bootstrap.The user can create a profile, share posts, leave likes and comments.I had a bit of trubbles building the backend, because of my backend-skills, and to make it work fine it was a bit tricky.

Custom Javascript Navigation

Portfolio

The projects that are already working are listed in my portfolio. The javascript functionality for the navigation between sections was the hardest part to build, the project opens with a page transition feeling, when clicking the title. I am now making it look better for small devices.

SASS & New Design

Lodge Renting

Is a modern looking web page made with SASS, with new features, animations, and styles. The design of the project is built considering possible changes in the future, so the page is easy maintainable. In this web page are put together many properties to make it look at best as possible for the user.

Specific Of My Portfolio

Content and Ideas

I am now making my portfolio responsive and better to navigate for small devices, and linking the last projects. An idea was making the layout navigable through the nav arrows in an horizontal space, to have an modern user interface that is interactive, fun, easy, and with the core information. Made with CSS JavaScript HTML5 the goal was to make it feel like a mobile app, and comfortable when displayed bigger desktop screens.
